translation.heroDescription: Dog daycare in Staffanstorp focusing on safety, joy, and development

infoSection.title: Information
infoSection.content: I am currently renovating the dog daycare to create an even safer and more homely environment for all dogs. Among other things, there will be a fenced play area in the garden and private boxes for each dog adapted to their needs. I respect each dog's personality and let them make contact at their own pace. Pictures coming soon!

about.title: About Me
about.bio: My name is Alicja and I am a certified dog behaviorist with a big heart for our four-legged friends. I run Clever Dog in Staffanstorp at Malmövägen 7, where safety and joy are at the center for every dog.
about.bio2: Together with my 3-year-old Shiba Inu, I create a calm and loving environment for dogs to develop in. Later this year, I will also offer dog grooming as part of the business.
about.bio3: With our strategic location just 10 minutes from Lund and 15 minutes from Malmö, we offer dog owners throughout the region convenient and accessible high-quality dog care.
about.permission: The business is approved by the County Administrative Board (Länsstyrelsen) and I have all necessary permits for dog daycare and boarding operations.

socialWalks.title: Social Walks
socialWalks.description: We also organize Social Walks – group walks where dogs and owners can practice socializing with other dogs in calm and controlled forms. An excellent way to promote social behavior and strengthen the bonds between dog and owner.

structuredWalks.title: Structured Walks
structuredWalks.description: Our walks are carefully planned to create a calm and safe environment.

socialization.title: Socialization
socialization.description: Dogs get to meet other dogs in a controlled environment with professional guidance.

strengthenedBonds.title: Strengthened Bonds
strengthenedBonds.description: Builds a stronger bond between dog and owner through shared positive experiences.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.holidayDescription: Christmas, New Year's Eve, Easter and other major holidays
pricing.notes: All prices include VAT. Special prices for multiple dogs from the same family.
pricing.contactNote: Contact us for more information and to discuss your specific needs.
pricing.walkNote: Social Walk groups have a maximum of 5 dogs per group.

social.title: Social Media
social.followText: Stay updated with our latest dog daycare activities, events, and cute dog photos. Follow us on Instagram for daily updates.

footer.locationTitle: Perfect location for dog owners in the region
footer.strategicLocation: With our strategic location in Staffanstorp, we are easily accessible for dog owners from all of southwestern Skåne:
footer.welcomeDogs: We welcome dogs from the entire region including:
footer.areasList: Dalby, Södra Sandby, Veberöd, Genarp, Hjärup, Lomma, Bjärred, Åkarp, Arlöv, Burlöv, and all of Malmö including areas such as Limhamn, Hyllie, Oxie, and Husie.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.goal: Clever Dog supports UN Global Goal #8: Decent Work and Economic Growth.
sustainability.description: We believe in fair working conditions, local employment, and contributing to a sustainable society. By offering quality dog care and future dog grooming services, we aim to create safe and meaningful workplaces – while growing together with our local community.
